basics.name: Yunus SARIBULUT
basics.label: .NET Backend Developer
basics.summary: Hi I am Yunus, I live in Istanbul. With a decade of extensive experience in the tech industry, My expert knowledge spans a diverse range of technologies, including C#, .NET, and EF Core for back-end development, complemented by robust database management skills with both relational (MSSQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL (MongoDB) databases. Throughout my career, I have consistently demonstrated an ability to lead complex projects from conception to completion, working collaboratively with cross-functional teams to meet and exceed client expectations.

work.summary: It is a cloud-based artificial intelligence solution that speeds up and streamlines companies' recruitment processes.
highlights: Developed the backend and frontend of the project.
Responsible for the project's architecture, development, and management.
Integrated authentication, profile management, resume management and more.

work.summary: Comprehensive platform where you can manage all HR processes.
highlights: Developed the backend and frontend of the project.
Responsible for the project's architecture, development, and management.
Integrated notification, authentication, faceid, employee management, demand management and more.

work.summary: CatchJobs is a new application facilitating communication between job seekers and employers in the service sector.
highlights: Developed the backend, frontend, mobile app, backoffice and admin panel of the project.
Integrated Job posting, resume management, payment providers and more.

work.summary: Otelz is an online travel agency established in Turkey in 2014.
highlights: Developed the backend and frontend of the backoffice of the project.
Integrated virtual management system for the backoffice.
Integrated payment providers and made features for the backoffice.

work.summary: This is a survey website where you can share your thoughts with brands and earn discounts.
highlights: Developed the backend, frontend and backoffice of the project.
Added coupon management and reporting features.

work.summary: GoTalk is a company offers physical SIM, e-SIM and VPN solutions for connectivity.
highlights: Developed the backend, frontend and mobile app of the project.
Integrated payment providers and made features for the backoffice.
